moves.1. d4 g6 2. e4 Bg7 3. e5 d6 4. f4 dxe5 5: This is where it gets interesting. I believe my opponent thinks I am going to move Nf7. My whole motivation is really to use Bf7  just to stop the castle and keep the king struck in the center.
moves.11... Qc8: Opponent bites on the Nf7 ruse.
moves.12. Bf7+: I expect Kf8 and I am suprised at the move.
moves.12... Kd8: I look at this move and in milli seconds realize the game is won.
moves.13. Ne6#: A most excellent ruse on a good player.
